MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.35am for safety due to an underground cable fault at Fineview place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57am on Wednesday, 27 January 2021
